pages.title: Placement
pages.text: Place multiblock bombs horizontallyâ€”align the nose toward the target and the tail toward propulsion or fins. Follow the listed nose-to-tail order for each assembly and leave clear space behind thruster variants.

pages.title: Single Blocks
pages.text: Smoke, gas, and regular bombs place like TNT (use redstone_tnt for display). Single-block nuclear fission or fusion bombs need a fuze to work, and the multiblock instructions follow in their own entries.
